scripts.prebuild: yarn --cwd client install && yarn --cwd shared install
scripts.build: yarn --cwd client build && yarn --cwd shared build
scripts.dev: yarn install && yarn build && nodemon -r dotenv/config server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.docker: yarn install && yarn build && forever -c 'node -r dotenv/config' server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
